Based on your preferences, I would recommend the movie "Red Cliff". This historical film is based on the battle of Red Cliffs fought between China's three major dynasties (205 B.C.) - the Han Dynasty, the Jin Dynasty and the Song Dynasty respectively  - and their rival states such as Wei, Ji and Yue. The movie follows the lives and struggles of several key characters including General Liu Bai, General Zhang Liang, Sun Quan, Yu Zhiyu and Zhou Cui. The battle at Red Cliffs is one of the most famous battles in history and has inspired countless books, movies, TV shows, video games, comics, stage plays and musicals over the years.

The movie follows the life of a young New York City comedian named Alvy Singer. Alvy's life changes when he meets Annie Hall, a aspiring nightclub singer who moves to New York City from Chicago.
Alvy and Annie start dating but their relationship soon becomes complicated by various issues such as jealousy, dishonesty, infidelity and other related issues.
Despite the many problems that they encounter in their relationship, Alvy and Annie continue to try and work things out between them. Despite their best efforts, however, despite their best efforts, Alvy and Annie ultimately decide to end their relationship with each other.
